reviews.review: very cool  kanye but a lot of haxers in the game

Les graphismes sont plutôt bon, les hitbox aussi, mais parcontre, depuis la mise à jour qui rend le jeux gratuit, il y a beaucoup trop de tricheur. Je trouve ça pas juste pour ceux qui ont payer le jeux, nous sommes obligés d'endurer ses tricheur alors qu'avant, la sécuritée et l'anti cheat étais quand même bon, mais maintenant, c'est insuportable.
Хорошая игра с огромным спектром возможностей. Читы на любой вкус и цвет. Тиммейты на любую зрелость. Из своей команды даже можно сделать овощное рагу!!!) Всем советую!
Un juego competitivo del cual jamas te vas a aburrir porque solo piensas en mejorar cada vez que entras en una partida
if your looking for a competitive shooter this is it high paced and very adictive
B E A S T  M O D E
learn ak and you will be global
schlechtes matchmaking, viele hacker unterwegs...nach source eine schlechte alternative
best fps game of all time
Great game to play from time to time exept the times that cheaters manage to get into your game. 10/10 would recomend

Awesome game. Love the guns, maps and features! For people who are new to gun games, GET THIS GAME RIGHT NOW! First of all. It will improve your aim in other games. I'm not joking, my aim was terrible in r6 but after 500+ hours (counting my main) on this game, it will improve massively. Would recommend.

Если хотите научится материться на все языкам мира то эта игра для вас, так же в этой игре вы найдёте неодыкватных тиммеётов, а так же здесь можно найти музыкантов беркутов. В общем игра весёлая шо ппц.
if you readin this ur mom gay

This game is on the break to being great. the only thing that stops it is valves refusal to do something about the cheaters in the game. Because if you are just starting the game op, for the first time then you will meet cheater, after cheater, as you try to get better at the game. I don't think I'm the only one that thinks that it is hard to love a game where you have a 30-40% chance that you will need to spendt op to 40 min. in a game where you just get shit on because somebody on the other team is cheating with wall or aim -hack.
There are a lot of hackers but the game play is perfect. I love this game but I hope they can figure something out for those hackers.
long term good memories of playing this game

Valve's Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) debuted in 2012, backed by a strong heritage of multiplayer FPS titles, including the original Counter-Strike and Counter-Strike: Source. Now, six years later, the fast-paced PC game still mostly holds its own against more modern titles, partly because of its established core gameplay and active community.
typical vavle shit game allowing cheaters to rule it!

- Δύσκολο για τους νέους παίκτες
- Μικροαλλαγές που θα ενοχλήσουν τους βετεράνους
